1.0.1.name: wordpress/thecartpress-productoptions
1.0.1.description:
TheCartPress Product Options is a plugin for TheCartPress. It allows to add one or two options levels to the products, such as sizes, colors... This plugin has been deprecated, please download Dynamic Options

TheCartPress Product Options

  • Allows to edit the options by a admin pages
  • Allows to set the custom view of the options: One or Two Selection lists
  • Supports Multi Lingual

Unlimited features

  • TheCartPress-productoptions is compatible with TheCartPress and has been developed by TheCartPress Team.

More info and Community

TheCartPress Site TheCartPress Community
